title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.7 - Penalties for violations of airport rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.7 - Penalties for violations of airport rules and regulations

State Regulations
(a) Any person failing to comply with or
violating any rule or regulation contained herein shall be guilty of a
violation of law and, upon conviction thereof, may be fined up to $250 for each
such violation. (b) In addition to
the penalties prescribed in subdivision (a) of this section, operators who
willfully continue to violate the airport rules and regulations may be denied
the use of the airport and its facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
